CartTax.name: CartTax
CartTax.description: Represents taxes for a line item in a WebCart that’s active in a store built with B2B Commerce or D2C Commerce.

AdjustmentTargetType.description: Target for the price adjustment (the cart itself or individual items). This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.

CartId.description: The ID of the WebCart being taxed.

CartItemId.description: The ID of a cart item being taxed.

CartItemPriceAdjustmentId.description: The ID of a price adjustment for a cart item being taxed. (This field is available in API version 52.0 and later.)

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. Default value is USD. Valid values include:

Description.description: A description of the tax. Enter up to 2000 characters.

Name.description: The name of this CartTax record. Name can be up to 255 characters.

TaxCalculationDate.description: The date this tax was calculated.

TaxRate.description: The applied tax rate for this line of tax.

TaxType.description: The type of tax for this line of tax. Possible values are: Actual Estimated
